com.example.jenxmout.greyhoundauctions

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.jenxmout.greyhoundauctions.Item

  • public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a Item class that defines an item to be used for the GreyhoundsAuctions event

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected double[] autoBidMax
      The list of the top two auto-bid values for a particular item.
      protected User[] autoBidUsers
      The list of the top two auto-bid users for a particular item.
      protected double currentHighestBid
      The value of the current highest bid on an item
      protected java.lang.String currentHighestBidder
      The name of the current highest bidder on an item
      protected java.lang.String description
      The description of the item
      protected double minInc
      The minimum increment you can set on an item as a bidder
      protected android.graphics.Bitmap resID
      The resID that represents the bitmap of the image
      protected java.lang.String[] tags
      The list of tags that pertain to an item
      protected java.lang.String title
      The title of the item

        protected User[] autoBidUsers
        The list of the top two auto-bid users for a particular item. The top two have the highest max bids

        The list of the top two auto-bid values for a particular item. The top two have the highest max bids

        desc - the description of the item
        resID - the image bitmap of the item

    • Method Detail

      • addAutoBid

        protected boolean addAutoBid(User user,
                             double max)
        This method is called when a user auto-bids on an item. The user and their max bid are added to the auto-bid lists if there are no other users or one other user in the auto-bid lists or the users max bid is higher than the values in the auto-bid max list
        Parameters:
        user - the user placing an auto-bid
        max - the user's max bid value on an item
        Returns:

      • updateAutoBid

        protected void updateAutoBid()
        This method, when called, evaluates the current highest bid in regard to the two current highest max bids. This method also updates the current highest bid and current highest bidder according to the highest auto-bid request.

      • leastMaxIndex

        protected int leastMaxIndex()
        This method returns the index of the smaller value of the two max bid values in the list
        Returns:
        1 if the smallest value is in the second index 0 if the smallest value is in the first index

      • greatestMaxIndex

        protected int greatestMaxIndex()
        This method returns the index of the greatest value of the two max bid values in the list
        Returns:
        1 if the greatest value is in the second index 0 if the greatest value is in the first index
